parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Locations

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a location's size.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''size''' location

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> location: [[Location]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> in format [x,y] in meters
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_locSize = [[size]] myLocation</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setSize]]
</value></part></template>
